-- Lynxiz --

She tilts her head at Lioconvoy and then the other way at 
Doomsday, "Lynxiz MAXIMIZE!" She leaps into the air, and she folds 
into robot mode. "Hmmm, alright, I'll talk with Panthero. Mind 
taking me to him or her?"

ooC: Doomsday and Icey Doom are going to rejected if they don't 
become characters to be RPed. Right now you have them down as gods 
and as such are invicible. There is a rule that specifically states 
that no bots may be invincible, and therefore we shouldn't need to 
create a rule saying that gods are not allowed, because it is only 
common sense NOT to have them. This is a Beast Wars RPG, and the 
aren't even Transformers.

Baphomet (LN, make sure you're reading this) is alright as long as 
he only works through his underlings, and doesn't use his power 
personally.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Hottie4u2have1@a... wrote:
> Lioconvoy:I am Lioconvoy and are goals are to help out groups that 
are in 
> need and make some new friends unfortunately it seems there is 
only violence 
> and carnage here so we will have to fight D-13 and other evil bots 
if they  
> start a fight with us. You should really talk to Panthero to find 
out more.
> Doomsday:I am Doomsday and i have just landed here.Me and my 
brother are the 
> catz god you see we have ultimate power which we use just to 
defend ourselves 
> and help out are brothers.
